hero.title: Hello, I'm Aimed Dine Chebili
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer and Multidisciplinary Entrepreneur
hero.description: At 20 years old, I've built a business ecosystem spanning from audio technology to tourist accommodations and automotive diagnostics. My passion is creating solutions that connect technological innovation with real people's needs.
hero.highlight: Available for new projects and collaborations

about.title: Who I am
about.biography: I am an entrepreneur with more than 10 years of experience in the technology and tourism sector. My passion for innovation has led me to create three complementary businesses that cover different market needs.

cta.title: Let's work together?
cta.subtitle: I'm always open to new projects and collaborations. Let's talk about your next idea!
